queries.description: Privileged containers lack essential security restrictions and should be avoided by removing the 'privileged' flag or by changing its value to false
Containers should not have CAP_SYS_ADMIN Linux capability

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=csi-qingcloud should not use CAP_SYS_ADMIN Linux capability

queries.query_name: Non Kube System Pod With Host Mount
queries.description: A non kube-system workload should not have hostPath mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'csi-qingcloud-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/dev' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'csi-qingcloud-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/dev' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'csi-qingcloud-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry/' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'csi-qingcloud-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry/' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'csi-qingcloud-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/etc/qingcloud' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'csi-qingcloud-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/etc/qingcloud' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'csi-qingcloud-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/disk.csi.qingcloud.com/' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'csi-qingcloud-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/disk.csi.qingcloud.com/' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'csi-qingcloud-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/var/lib/kubelet' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'csi-qingcloud-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/var/lib/kubelet' mounted

queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{csi-qingcloud-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{csi-qingcloud}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{csi-qingcloud-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{node-registrar}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{csi-qingcloud-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{csi-provisioner}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{csi-qingcloud-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{csi-attacher}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{csi-qingcloud-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{csi-resizer}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{csi-qingcloud-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{csi-snapshotter}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

queries.query_name: Volume Mount With OS Directory Write Permissions
queries.description: Containers can mount sensitive folders from the hosts, giving them potentially dangerous access to critical host configurations and binaries.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{csi-qingcloud-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{csi-qingcloud}}.volumeMounts.name={{kubelet-dir}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{csi-qingcloud-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{csi-qingcloud}}.volumeMounts.name={{dev-dir}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{csi-qingcloud-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{csi-qingcloud}}.volumeMounts.name={{server-config}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{csi-qingcloud-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{csi-qingcloud}}.volumeMounts.name={{server-config}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true

files.actual_value: Workload name 'csi-qingcloud-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/var/lib/kubelet' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'csi-qingcloud-node' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/etc/qingcloud' with hostPath

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{csi-qingcloud-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{csi-snapshotter}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{csi-qingcloud-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{csi-provisioner}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{csi-qingcloud-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{csi-qingcloud}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{csi-qingcloud-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{csi-qingcloud}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{csi-qingcloud-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{csi-resizer}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{csi-qingcloud-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{node-registrar}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{csi-qingcloud-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{csi-attacher}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.
Containers should not have extra capabilities allowed

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{csi-qingcloud-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{csi-qingcloud}} has no capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{csi-qingcloud-node}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{csi-qingcloud}} has a capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE

queries.description: Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities
Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.
Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

queries.description: Sees if Kubernetes Drop Capabilities exists to ensure containers security context
Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

metadata.name={{csi-qingcloud-node}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{csi-qingcloud-controller}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
metadata.name={{csi-qingcloud-node}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
